name: MagmaFox & Stuff (.exe)
description:
This is a game made in the Untitled Game Jam #41.

The theme was Relax and i decided to make a game that has a pretty low difficulty and a low penalty.

This game is a collection of 70's games in a WarioWare type of fashion.

web version: MagmaFox & Stuff (web) by CastimierDev (itch.io)
